c4_definicion.texto: The C4 architecture is a model for visualizing software systems.
c4_definicion.fonetica: ðə ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ ɪz ə ˈmɑdəl fɔɹ ˈvɪʒuəˌlaɪzɪŋ ˈsɔftwɛɹ ˈsɪstəmz

c4_origen.texto: The C4 model was created by Simon Brown.
c4_origen.fonetica: ðə ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈmɑdəl wɑz kɹiˈeɪtɪd baɪ ˈsaɪmən bɹaʊn

c4_objetivo.texto: The goal of C4 is to simplify architecture communication.
c4_objetivo.fonetica: ðə ɡoʊl əv ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz tə ˈsɪmplɪfaɪ ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən

c4_niveles.texto: C4 uses four levels of diagrams.
c4_niveles.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈjusɪz fɔɹ ˈlɛvəlz əv ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz

c4_contexto.texto: The first level is the context diagram.
c4_contexto.fonetica: ðə fɝst ˈlɛvəl ɪz ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm

c4_contenedor.texto: The second level is the container diagram.
c4_contenedor.fonetica: ðə ˈsɛkənd ˈlɛvəl ɪz ðə kənˈteɪnɚ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm

c4_componentes.texto: The third level is the component diagram.
c4_componentes.fonetica: ðə θɝd ˈlɛvəl ɪz ðə kəmˈpoʊnənt ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm

c4_codigo.texto: The fourth level is the code diagram.
c4_codigo.fonetica: ðə fɔɹθ ˈlɛvəl ɪz ðə koʊd ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm

c4_comunicacion.texto: C4 improves communication between technical and non-technical teams.
c4_comunicacion.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪmˈpɹuvz kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən bɪˈtwin ˈtɛknɪkəl ænd nɑn-ˈtɛknɪkəl timz

c4_abstraccion.texto: Each C4 level provides a different level of abstraction.
c4_abstraccion.fonetica: iʧ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈlɛvəl pɹəˈvaɪdz ə ˈdɪfɚənt ˈlɛvəl əv æbˈstɹækʃən

c4_universidad.texto: C4 is used in universities and companies to teach architecture.
c4_universidad.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz juzd ɪn ˌjunəˈvɝsɪtiz ænd ˈkʌmpəniz tə tiʧ ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ

c4_documentacion.texto: The C4 model helps document systems clearly.
c4_documentacion.fonetica: ðə ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈmɑdəl hɛlps ˈdɑkjəmɛnt ˈsɪstəmz ˈklɪɹli

c4_comprension.texto: C4 diagrams facilitate understanding of complex systems.
c4_comprension.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz fəˈsɪləˌteɪt ˌʌndɚˈstændɪŋ əv ˈkɑmplɛks ˈsɪstəmz

c4_equipo.texto: C4 enables everyone on the team to share the same vision.
c4_equipo.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪˈneɪbəlz ˈɛvɹiˌwʌn ɑn ðə tim tə ʃɛɹ ðə seɪm ˈvɪʒən

c4_inversion.texto: The C4 model reduces learning costs for new team members.
c4_inversion.fonetica: ðə ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈmɑdəl ɹɪˈdusɪz ˈlɝnɪŋ kɔsts fɔɹ nu tim ˈmɛmbɚz

c4_representacion.texto: C4 represents systems from general to specific.
c4_representacion.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˌɹɛprɪˈzɛnts ˈsɪstəmz fɹəm ˈʤɛnɚəl tə spəˈsɪfɪk

c4_flexibilidad.texto: C4 diagrams are flexible and adaptable.
c4_flexibilidad.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ɑɹ ˈflɛksəbəl ænd əˈdæptəbəl

c4_similitud_planos.texto: C4 is inspired by building construction blueprints.
c4_similitud_planos.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ɪnˈspaɪɚd baɪ ˈbɪldɪŋ kənˈstɹʌkʃən ˈbluˌpɹɪnts

c4_contexto_pregunta.texto: The context diagram answers the question: what is this system?
c4_contexto_pregunta.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ˈænsɚz ðə ˈkwɛsʧən wʌt ɪz ðɪs ˈsɪstəm

c4_contexto_externo.texto: The context diagram shows external actors.
c4_contexto_externo.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ʃoʊz ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈæktɚz

c4_contexto_alcance.texto: The context diagram defines the system scope.
c4_contexto_alcance.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm dɪˈfaɪnz ðə ˈsɪstəm skoʊp

c4_contenedor_def.texto: The container diagram shows the main applications.
c4_contenedor_def.fonetica: ðə kənˈteɪnɚ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ʃoʊz ðə meɪn ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz

c4_componentes_def.texto: The component diagram details the pieces of each application.
c4_componentes_def.fonetica: ðə kəmˈpoʊnənt ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ˈditeɪlz ðə ˈpisɪz əv iʧ ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃən

c4_componentes_uso.texto: Each component typically corresponds to a class or module.
c4_componentes_uso.fonetica: iʧ kəmˈpoʊnənt ˈtɪpɪkli ˌkɔɹəˈspɑndz tə ə klæs ɔɹ ˈmɑʤul

c4_codigo_def.texto: The code diagram shows the design at the class and method level.
c4_codigo_def.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ʃoʊz ðə dɪˈzaɪn æt ðə klæs ænd ˈmɛθəd ˈlɛvəl

c4_codigo_detalle.texto: This level is optional and depends on the required detail.
c4_codigo_detalle.fonetica: ðɪs ˈlɛvəl ɪz ˈɑpʃənəl ænd dɪˈpɛndz ɑn ðə ɹɪˈkwaɪɚd ˈditeɪl

c4_codigo_documentacion.texto: The code level is used to document specific decisions.
c4_codigo_documentacion.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ɪz juzd tə ˈdɑkjəmɛnt spəˈsɪfɪk dɪˈsɪʒənz

c4_codigo_publico.texto: It's not always necessary to show the code level to everyone.
c4_codigo_publico.fonetica: ɪts nɑt ˈɔlweɪz ˈnɛsəˌsɛɹi tə ʃoʊ ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl tə ˈɛvɹiˌwʌn

c4_ventaja_claridad.texto: An advantage of C4 is clarity in communication.
c4_ventaja_claridad.fonetica: ən ədˈvæntɪʤ əv ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ˈklɛɹɪti ɪn kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən

c4_ventaja_consistencia.texto: C4 provides consistency in system documentation.
c4_ventaja_consistencia.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ pɹəˈvaɪdz kənˈsɪstənsi ɪn ˈsɪstəm ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən

c4_ventaja_aprendizaje.texto: C4 diagrams accelerate learning for new developers.
c4_ventaja_aprendizaje.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ækˈsɛləɹeɪt ˈlɝnɪŋ fɔɹ nu dɪˈvɛləpɚz

c4_ventaja_colaboracion.texto: C4 fosters collaboration among multidisciplinary teams.
c4_ventaja_colaboracion.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈfɑstɚz kəˌlæbəˈɹeɪʃən əˈmʌŋ ˌmʌltiˈdɪsəplɪˌnɛɹi timz

c4_ventaja_escalabilidad.texto: The C4 model is useful for large and scalable systems.
c4_ventaja_escalabilidad.fonetica: ðə ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈmɑdəl ɪz ˈjusfəl fɔɹ lɑɹʤ ænd ˈskeɪləbəl ˈsɪstəmz

c4_ventaja_foco.texto: Each C4 level allows focusing on different aspects.
c4_ventaja_foco.fonetica: iʧ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈlɛvəl əˈlaʊz ˈfoʊkəsɪŋ ɑn ˈdɪfɚənt ˈæspɛkts

c4_limite_no_estandar.texto: C4 is not an official standard, but it's widely used.
c4_limite_no_estandar.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz nɑt ən əˈfɪʃəl ˈstændɚd bʌt ɪts ˈwaɪdli juzd

c4_limite_detalle.texto: A limitation of C4 is that it doesn't prescribe exact detail levels.
c4_limite_detalle.fonetica: ə ˌlɪmɪˈteɪʃən əv ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ðæt ɪt ˈdʌzənt prɪˈskɹaɪb ɪɡˈzækt ˈditeɪl ˈlɛvəlz

c4_limite_practica.texto: C4's effectiveness depends on the team's practice.
c4_limite_practica.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹz ɪˈfɛktɪvnəs dɪˈpɛndz ɑn ðə timz ˈpɹæktɪs

c4_limite_experiencia.texto: Good use of C4 requires modeling experience.
c4_limite_experiencia.fonetica: ɡʊd juz əv ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɹɪˈkwaɪɚz ˈmɑdəlɪŋ ɪkˈspɪɹiəns

c4_contexto_ejemplo.texto: A context diagram example is an online banking system.
c4_contexto_ejemplo.fonetica: ə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ɪɡˈzæmpəl ɪz ən ˈɑnˌlaɪn ˈbæŋkɪŋ ˈsɪstəm

c4_contenedor_ejemplo.texto: The container diagram shows the web app and database.
c4_contenedor_ejemplo.fonetica: ðə kənˈteɪnɚ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm ʃoʊz ðə wɛb æp ænd ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs

c4_componentes_ejemplo.texto: A web app component could be the payment module.
c4_componentes_ejemplo.fonetica: ə wɛb æp kəmˈpoʊnənt kʊd bi ðə ˈpeɪmənt ˈmɑʤul

c4_codigo_ejemplo.texto: The code level details classes like User or Transaction.
c4_codigo_ejemplo.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ˈditeɪlz ˈklæsɪz laɪk ˈjuzɚ ɔɹ tɹænˈzækʃən

c4_usabilidad_empresas.texto: Many companies use C4 to document their internal systems.
c4_usabilidad_empresas.fonetica: ˈmɛni ˈkʌmpəniz juz ˈsi ˈfɔɹ tə ˈdɑkjəmɛnt ðɛɹ ɪnˈtɝnəl ˈsɪstəmz

c4_usabilidad_gobierno.texto: Governments also adopt C4 in technology projects.
c4_usabilidad_gobierno.fonetica: ˈɡʌvɚnmənts ˈɔlsoʊ əˈdɑpt ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪn tɛkˈnɑləʤi ˈpɹɑʤɛkts

c4_usabilidad_startups.texto: Startups apply C4 to quickly communicate their designs.
c4_usabilidad_startups.fonetica: ˈstɑɹtˌʌps əˈplaɪ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ tə ˈkwɪkli kəˈmjunəˌkeɪt ðɛɹ dɪˈzaɪnz

c4_usabilidad_educacion.texto: In education, C4 helps teach software architecture.
c4_usabilidad_educacion.fonetica: ɪn ˌɛʤəˈkeɪʃən ˈsi ˈfɔɹ hɛlps tiʧ ˈsɔftwɛɹ ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ

c4_relacion_uml.texto: C4 complements UML but doesn't replace it.
c4_relacion_uml.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈkɑmplɪmɛnts ˈju ˈɛm ˈɛl bʌt ˈdʌzənt ɹiˈpleɪs ɪt

c4_relacion_arq.texto: C4 doesn't replace other architectures, it makes them more understandable.
c4_relacion_arq.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdʌzənt ɹiˈpleɪs ˈʌðɚɹ ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚz ɪt meɪks ðɛm mɔɹ ˌʌndɚˈstændəbəl

c4_relacion_documentacion.texto: C4 forms part of architectural documentation.
c4_relacion_documentacion.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ fɔɹmz pɑɹt əv ˌɑɹkɪˈtɛkʧɚəl ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən

c4_relacion_bbdd.texto: C4 diagrams don't show specific database tables.
c4_relacion_bbdd.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz doʊnt ʃoʊ spəˈsɪfɪk ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs ˈteɪbəlz

c4_relacion_microservicios.texto: C4 is very useful for visualizing microservices.
c4_relacion_microservicios.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ˈvɛɹi ˈjusfəl fɔɹ ˈvɪʒuəˌlaɪzɪŋ ˈmaɪkɹoʊˌsɝvɪsɪz

c4_relacion_monolito.texto: C4 can also be used in monolithic systems.
c4_relacion_monolito.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ kæn ˈɔlsoʊ bi juzd ɪn ˌmɑnəˈlɪθɪk ˈsɪstəmz

c4_relacion_eventos.texto: C4 diagrams don't show queues or event buses in detail.
c4_relacion_eventos.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz doʊnt ʃoʊ kjuz ɔɹ ɪˈvɛnt ˈbʌsɪz ɪn ˈditeɪl

c4_practica_iterativa.texto: Creating C4 diagrams is usually iterative.
c4_practica_iterativa.fonetica: kɹiˈeɪtɪŋ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ɪz ˈjuʒəwəli ˈɪtəɹətɪv

c4_practica_equipo.texto: It's recommended to build C4 diagrams together with the team.
c4_practica_equipo.fonetica: ɪts ˌɹɛkəˈmɛndɪd tə bɪld ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz təˈɡɛðɚ wɪð ðə tim

c4_practica_herramientas.texto: There are online tools for creating C4 diagrams.
c4_practica_herramientas.fonetica: ðɛɹ ɑɹ ˈɑnˌlaɪn tulz fɔɹ kɹiˈeɪtɪŋ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz

c4_practica_plantillas.texto: Many C4 templates are available on the internet.
c4_practica_plantillas.fonetica: ˈmɛni ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈtɛmplɪts ɑɹ əˈveɪləbəl ɑn ði ˈɪntɚˌnɛt

c4_documentacion_necesidad.texto: C4 documentation is necessary for long-lasting systems.
c4_documentacion_necesidad.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən ɪz ˈnɛsəˌsɛɹi fɔɹ ˈlɔŋ-ˈlæstɪŋ ˈsɪstəmz

c4_documentacion_actualizacion.texto: C4 diagrams should be updated when the system changes.
c4_documentacion_actualizacion.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ʃʊd bi ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd wɛn ðə ˈsɪstəm ˈʧeɪnʤɪz

c4_documentacion_equipo.texto: It's useful for everyone on the team to participate in C4 documentation.
c4_documentacion_equipo.fonetica: ɪts ˈjusfəl fɔɹ ˈɛvɹiˌwʌn ɑn ðə tim tə pɑɹˈtɪsəpeɪt ɪn ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən

c4_documentacion_mantenimiento.texto: Maintaining C4 diagrams ensures design coherence.
c4_documentacion_mantenimiento.fonetica: meɪnˈteɪnɪŋ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ɪnˈʃʊɚz dɪˈzaɪn koʊˈhɪɹəns

c4_documentacion_versiones.texto: It's recommended to maintain versions of C4 diagrams.
c4_documentacion_versiones.fonetica: ɪts ˌɹɛkəˈmɛndɪd tə meɪnˈteɪn ˈvɝʒənz əv ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz

c4_uso_inicio.texto: C4 is applied from the start of a software project.
c4_uso_inicio.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz əˈplaɪd fɹəm ðə stɑɹt əv ə ˈsɔftwɛɹ ˈpɹɑʤɛkt

c4_uso_refactor.texto: C4 is also used during refactoring processes.
c4_uso_refactor.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ˈɔlsoʊ juzd ˈdʊɹɪŋ ɹiˈfæktɚɪŋ ˈpɹɑsɛsɪz

c4_uso_onboarding.texto: C4 is key in onboarding new developers.
c4_uso_onboarding.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ki ɪn ˈɑnˌbɔɹdɪŋ nu dɪˈvɛləpɚz

c4_uso_auditoria.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz səˈpɔɹt ˈsɔftwɛɹ ˈɔdɪts

c4_uso_seguridad.texto: C4 helps map security flows within the system.
c4_uso_seguridad.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ hɛlps mæp sɪˈkjʊɹɪti floʊz wɪˈðɪn ðə ˈsɪstəm

c4_diagrama_contexto_usuario.texto: The context diagram identifies users and external systems.
c4_diagrama_contexto_usuario.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm aɪˈdɛntɪfaɪz ˈjuzɚz ænd ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈsɪstəmz

c4_diagrama_contexto_dominio.texto: The context defines the system domain.
c4_diagrama_contexto_dominio.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst dɪˈfaɪnz ðə ˈsɪstəm doʊˈmeɪn

c4_diagrama_contenedor_app.texto: A container is typically a deployable application.
c4_diagrama_contenedor_app.fonetica: ə kənˈteɪnɚ ɪz ˈtɪpɪkli ə dɪˈplɔɪəbəl ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃən

c4_diagrama_contenedor_db.texto: Another typical container is a database.
c4_diagrama_contenedor_db.fonetica: əˈnʌðɚ ˈtɪpɪkəl kənˈteɪnɚ ɪz ə ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs

c4_diagrama_componentes_api.texto: A component can represent a business API.
c4_diagrama_componentes_api.fonetica: ə kəmˈpoʊnənt kæn ˌɹɛprɪˈzɛnt ə ˈbɪznəs ˈeɪ ˈpi ˈaɪ

c4_diagrama_componentes_servicio.texto: Another component could be an authentication service.
c4_diagrama_componentes_servicio.fonetica: əˈnʌðɚ kəmˈpoʊnənt kʊd bi ən ɔˌθɛntɪˈkeɪʃən ˈsɝvɪs

c4_diagrama_codigo_clase.texto: The code level details classes and their main methods.
c4_diagrama_codigo_clase.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ˈditeɪlz ˈklæsɪz ænd ðɛɹ meɪn ˈmɛθədz

c4_diagrama_codigo_test.texto: Test classes can also be documented in C4.
c4_diagrama_codigo_test.fonetica: tɛst ˈklæsɪz kæn ˈɔlsoʊ bi ˈdɑkjəmɛntɪd ɪn ˈsi ˈfɔɹ

c4_herramienta_drawio.texto: Draw.io is a popular tool for C4 diagrams.
c4_herramienta_drawio.fonetica: ˈdɹɔɪˌoʊ ɪz ə ˈpɑpjəlɚ tul fɔɹ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz

c4_herramienta_structurizr.texto: Structurizr was created by Simon Brown to support C4.
c4_herramienta_structurizr.fonetica: ˈstɹʌkʧəɹaɪzɚ wɑz kɹiˈeɪtɪd baɪ ˈsaɪmən bɹaʊn tə səˈpɔɹt ˈsi ˈfɔɹ

c4_herramienta_plantuml.fonetica: ˈplænt ˈju ˈɛm ˈɛl ˈɔlsoʊ səˈpɔɹts ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz

c4_herramienta_mermaid.texto: Mermaid allows creating C4 diagrams in markdown.
c4_herramienta_mermaid.fonetica: ˈmɝmeɪd əˈlaʊz kɹiˈeɪtɪŋ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ɪn ˈmɑɹkdaʊn

c4_practica_simplificacion.texto: The goal is to simplify, not add complexity.
c4_practica_simplificacion.fonetica: ðə ɡoʊl ɪz tə ˈsɪmplɪfaɪ nɑt æd kəmˈplɛksɪti

c4_practica_abstraccion.texto: Each level maintains the appropriate abstraction principle.
c4_practica_abstraccion.fonetica: iʧ ˈlɛvəl meɪnˈteɪnz ði əˈpɹoʊpɹiɪt æbˈstɹækʃən ˈpɹɪnsəpəl

c4_practica_comprension.texto: The reader should quickly understand the structure.
c4_practica_comprension.fonetica: ðə ˈɹidɚ ʃʊd ˈkwɪkli ˌʌndɚˈstænd ðə ˈstɹʌkʧɚ

c4_practica_historia.texto: C4 diagrams should tell the system's story.
c4_practica_historia.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ʃʊd tɛl ðə ˈsɪstəmz ˈstɔɹi

c4_practica_restriccion.texto: It's recommended not to overload diagrams with detail.
c4_practica_restriccion.fonetica: ɪts ˌɹɛkəˈmɛndɪd nɑt tə ˈoʊvɚˌloʊd ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz wɪð ˈditeɪl

codigo_no_es_diagrama.texto: Source code is not a good architecture diagram.
codigo_no_es_diagrama.fonetica: sɔɹs koʊd ɪz nɑt ə ɡʊd ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæm

necesidad_visualizacion.texto: We need to visualize architecture for all stakeholders.
necesidad_visualizacion.fonetica: wi nid tə ˈvɪʒuəˌlaɪz ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ fɔɹ ɔl ˈsteɪkˌhoʊldɚz

nivel_contexto.texto: The context level shows how the system interacts with its environment.
nivel_contexto.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈlɛvəl ʃoʊz haʊ ðə ˈsɪstəm ˌɪntɚˈækts wɪð ɪts ɪnˈvaɪɹənmənt

nivel_contenedor.texto: The container level explains the main applications and services.
nivel_contenedor.fonetica: ðə kənˈteɪnɚ ˈlɛvəl ɪkˈspleɪnz ðə meɪn ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz ænd ˈsɝvɪsɪz

nivel_componente.texto: The component level details the internal parts of each container.
nivel_componente.fonetica: ðə kəmˈpoʊnənt ˈlɛvəl ˈditeɪlz ði ɪnˈtɝnəl pɑɹts əv iʧ kənˈteɪnɚ

nivel_codigo.texto: The code level illustrates how a component is implemented.
nivel_codigo.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ˈɪləstɹeɪts haʊ ə kəmˈpoʊnənt ɪz ˈɪmpləmɛntɪd

ejemplo_contexto.texto: The context shows the user, external systems, and the main system.
ejemplo_contexto.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ʃoʊz ðə ˈjuzɚ ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈsɪstəmz ænd ðə meɪn ˈsɪstəm

ejemplo_contenedor.texto: The container level shows a web app, database, and API.
ejemplo_contenedor.fonetica: ðə kənˈteɪnɚ ˈlɛvəl ʃoʊz ə wɛb æp ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs ænd ˈeɪ ˈpi ˈaɪ

ejemplo_componente.texto: The component level shows controllers, services, and repositories.
ejemplo_componente.fonetica: ðə kəmˈpoʊnənt ˈlɛvəl ʃoʊz kənˈtɹoʊlɚz ˈsɝvɪsɪz ænd ɹɪˈpɑzɪˌtɔɹiz

ejemplo_codigo.texto: The code level shows classes, methods, and structures.
ejemplo_codigo.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ʃoʊz ˈklæsɪz ˈmɛθədz ænd ˈstɹʌkʧɚz

audiencia_distinta.texto: Each level is designed for a different audience.
audiencia_distinta.fonetica: iʧ ˈlɛvəl ɪz dɪˈzaɪnd fɔɹ ə ˈdɪfɚənt ˈɔdiəns

contexto_negocio.texto: The context usually interests executives and clients.
contexto_negocio.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ˈjuʒəwəli ˈɪntɹəsts ɪɡˈzɛkjətɪvz ænd ˈklaɪənts

contenedor_desarrollo.texto: Containers interest architects and senior developers.
contenedor_desarrollo.fonetica: kənˈteɪnɚz ˈɪntɹəst ˈɑɹkɪtɛkts ænd ˈsinjɚ dɪˈvɛləpɚz

componente_equipo.texto: Components are useful for development teams.
componente_equipo.fonetica: kəmˈpoʊnənts ɑɹ ˈjusfəl fɔɹ dɪˈvɛləpmənt timz

codigo_programadores.texto: The code level is key for programmers.
codigo_programadores.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ɪz ki fɔɹ ˈpɹoʊɡɹæmɚz

ejemplo_c4_real.texto: A real C4 example is modeling an online banking system.
ejemplo_c4_real.fonetica: ə ˈɹiəl ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪɡˈzæmpəl ɪz ˈmɑdəlɪŋ ən ˈɑnˌlaɪn ˈbæŋkɪŋ ˈsɪstəm

contexto_banca.texto: The context shows the customer, ATMs, and external systems.
contexto_banca.fonetica: ðə ˈkɑntɛkst ʃoʊz ðə ˈkʌstəmɚ ˈeɪ ˈti ˈɛmz ænd ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈsɪstəmz

contenedor_banca.texto: Containers represent the mobile app, web, and banking core.
contenedor_banca.fonetica: kənˈteɪnɚz ˌɹɛprɪˈzɛnt ðə ˈmoʊbəl æp ðə wɛb ænd ðə ˈbæŋkɪŋ kɔɹ

componente_banca.texto: Components detail authentication, payments, and queries.
componente_banca.fonetica: kəmˈpoʊnənts ˈditeɪl ɔˌθɛntɪˈkeɪʃən ˈpeɪmənts ænd ˈkwɪɹiz

codigo_banca.texto: The code level shows classes for users and transactions.
codigo_banca.fonetica: ðə koʊd ˈlɛvəl ʃoʊz ˈklæsɪz fɔɹ ˈjuzɚz ænd tɹænˈzækʃənz

claridad_c4.texto: C4 helps maintain clarity in large projects.
claridad_c4.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ hɛlps meɪnˈteɪn ˈklɛɹɪti ɪn lɑɹʤ ˈpɹɑʤɛkts

base_documentacion.texto: C4 diagrams are the foundation for technical documentation.
base_documentacion.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ɑɹ ðə faʊnˈdeɪʃən fɔɹ ˈtɛknɪkəl ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən

alineacion_equipo.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ əˈlaɪnz ˈtɛknɪkəl tim kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən

sencillez_valor.texto: C4's simplicity is part of its value.
sencillez_valor.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹz sɪmˈplɪsɪti ɪz pɑɹt əv ɪts ˈvælju

limitacion_detalle.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdʌzənt ɹiˈpleɪs ˈditeɪld ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən

flexibilidad_uso.texto: C4 diagrams adapt to different contexts.
flexibilidad_uso.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz əˈdæpt tə ˈdɪfɚənt ˈkɑntɛksts

aprendizaje_facil.texto: Learning C4 is easier than other modeling approaches.
aprendizaje_facil.fonetica: ˈlɝnɪŋ ˈsi ˈfɔɹ ɪz ˈiziɚ ðæn ˈʌðɚɹ ˈmɑdəlɪŋ əˈpɹoʊʧɪz

resumen_final.texto: C4 allows viewing a system from general to technical detail.
resumen_final.fonetica: ˈsi ˈfɔɹ əˈlaʊz ˈvjuɪŋ ə ˈsɪstəm fɹəm ˈʤɛnɚəl tə ˈtɛknɪkəl ˈditeɪl
